an4.263:1.1: “When a foolish, incompetent untrue person has four qualities they keep themselves broken and damaged. They deserve to be blamed and criticized by sensible people, and they create much wickedness.
an4.263:1.3: Blameworthy deeds by way of body, speech, and mind, and blameworthy view.
an4.263:1.4: When a foolish, incompetent untrue person has these four qualities they keep themselves broken and damaged. They deserve to be blamed and criticized by sensible people, and they create much wickedness.
an4.263:2.1: When an astute, competent true person has four qualities they keep themselves healthy and whole. They don’t deserve to be blamed and criticized by sensible people, and they create much merit.
an4.263:2.3: Blameless deeds by way of body, speech, and mind, and blameless view.
an4.263:2.4: When an astute, competent true person has these four qualities they keep themselves healthy and whole. They don’t deserve to be blamed and criticized by sensible people, and they create much merit.”
